title: Getting into champ select
body:
Going into champ select after clicking ready on afk check that pops up.

It happened in the match after as well

This is normal blind pick mode, I'll relog and see if it still happens

replies.body:
This is definitely something we need to fix. If we could get your logs, that would be immensely helpful in tracking down this problem. Could you submit a support ticket via [support.riotgames.com](https://support.riotgames.com) and attach the logs to it? 

[This support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208796286-Alpha-Client-becomes-unresponsive) has detailed instructions for how to grab logs for the alpha. It instructs you to grab the newest logs, but feel free to zip up the entire log directory if you've played any games since this occurred.
